name: system.multicall
shortDescription: Use this method to call multiple RPC methods at once in order to reduce traffic.
description: This method can be used to call multiple methods at the same time. This can speed up RPC communication as there is no latency between the RPC calls.

parameters.name: methods
parameters.description: An array of structs. Each struct represents one method and has two fields: methodName and params
parameters.exampleValue:
Array
( 
  Struct
  ( 
    [methodName]
    (
      (String) getValue
    )
    [params]
    (
      Array
      ( 
        (String) JEQ0551288:2
        (String) SETPOINT
      )
    )
  )
  Struct
  ( 
    [methodName]
    (
      (String) getValue
    )
    [params]
    (
      Array
      ( 
        (String) JEQ0552109:2
        (String) SETPOINT
      )
    )
  )
)

parameters.name: methodName
parameters.description: The name of the method to call

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: Array of the parameters which should be passed to the method

returnValue: Returns an Array of the method responses. Each element is one response.
